name: Al Jaami'
description: Al Jaami' is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The Gatherer' or 'The Collector'. It signifies the divine attribute of bringing together all of creation, including souls on the Day of Judgment.
summary: The name Al Jaami' reflects God's power to gather all beings and souls, emphasizing His ultimate control over the universe and the resurrection of humanity. This concept is rooted in Islamic teachings about the Day of Judgment, where all individuals will be resurrected and held accountable for their actions.
